clients.name: ConvenienceInCadlClient
clients.doc: TypeSpec project to test various types of convenience methods.

methods.name: updateConvenience
methods.doc: No initial operation methods. In the updated version, we add the protocol method and convenience method.

operation.name: updateConvenience
operation.doc: No initial operation methods. In the updated version, we add the protocol method and convenience method.

methods.name: convenienceOptionalBeforeRequired
methods.doc: No initial operation methods. In the updated version, we add the protocol method and convenience method.

methods.name: noConvenience
methods.doc: No convenience method. But if we add the convenientAPI decorator, there will be ambiguity.

methods.name: protocol
methods.doc: Initial operation only has protocol method. In the updated version, we add the convenience method.

methods.name: convenienceWithOptional
methods.doc: Operation has protocol method with optional RequestContext and convenience method.

methods.name: convenienceWithRequired
methods.doc: Operation has protocol method with required RequestContext and convenience method.

operation.doc: Operation has protocol method with required RequestContext and convenience method.

methods.name: convenienceShouldNotGenerate
methods.doc: Operation has protocol method marked with convenience method, but the convenience method should not be generated.

operation.name: convenienceShouldNotGenerate
operation.doc: Operation has protocol method marked with convenience method, but the convenience method should not be generated.

methods.name: protocolShouldNotGenerateConvenience
methods.doc: Initial operation only has protocol method, but the convenience method should not be generated even it marks the convenience decorator.

operation.name: protocolShouldNotGenerateConvenience
operation.doc: Initial operation only has protocol method, but the convenience method should not be generated even it marks the convenience decorator.
